Company: United States Bureau of Justice Statistics (BJS)
Description of incident: Hackers from Anonymous claim to have leaked 1.7 gigabytes of data belonging to the United States Bureau of Justice Statistics.  The United States Bureau of Justice Statistics is part of the U.S. Department of Justice and analyzes data related to crimes in the U.S. The data file was posted on The Pirate Bay. It contained internal emails and the website's entire database.
